
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<list>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<fstream>
#include<sstream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string>

#define tr(container, it) for(typeof(container.begin()) it = (container).begin();it!=(container).end();it++)
using namespace std;


int main()
{
map<string,int> map1;
int n;
string s;
scanf("%i",&n);
while(n--)
{
    cin >> s;
    map1[s]++;
}
tr(map1, it)
{
    cout << it->first << " " << it->second<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
